TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract serializable beforefieldinit ConstructorInfo extends System.Reflection.MethodBase implements class System.Runtime.InteropServices._ConstructorInfo
Public MustInherit Class ConstructorInfo Inherits MethodBase Implements _ConstructorInfo
public ref class ConstructorInfo abstract : System::Reflection::MethodBase, System::Runtime::InteropServices::_ConstructorInfo

summary.span: 探索類別建構函式的屬性，並提供建構函式中繼資料的存取。

span.span: Discovers the attributes of a class constructor and provides access to constructor metadata.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `ConstructorInfo` 用來探索的建構函式以及對於叫用建構函式的屬性。`ConstructorInfo` is used to discover the attributes of a constructor as well as to invoke a constructor. 物件可由呼叫上`ConstructorInfo`傳回由或方法物件。Objects are created by calling on a `ConstructorInfo` returned by either the or method of a object. > [!NOTE] > 繼承自數個成員，例如，可用來檢查泛型方法。 inherits from several members, such as , that can be used to examine generic methods. 在.NET Framework 2.0 版的建構函式不可以是泛型，因此這些成員傳回`false`或`null`。In the .NET Framework version 2.0 constructors cannot be generic, so these members return `false` or `null`. ## Examples 下列範例會使用`ConstructorInfo`與和來尋找符合指定的搜尋條件的建構函式。The following example uses `ConstructorInfo` with and to find the constructors that match the specified search criteria. [!code-cpp[type_getconstructor3#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Type_GetConstructor3/CPP/type_getconstructor3.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[type_getconstructor3#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Type_GetConstructor3/CS/type_getconstructor3.cs#1)] [!code-vb[type_getconstructor3#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Type_GetConstructor3/VB/type_getconstructor3.vb#1)]

span.span: for full trust for inheritors.

permission.span: 這個類別無法被繼承，部分信任程式碼。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited by partially trusted code.

threadsafe.span: 此型別具備執行緒安全。

span.span: This type is thread safe.

para.span: 當您繼承自，您必須覆寫下列成員多載： 。

span.span: When you inherit from , you must override the following member overload: .

MemberSignature.Value: public object Invoke (object[] parameters);
.method public hidebysig instance object Invoke(object[] parameters) cil managed
Public Function Invoke (parameters As Object()) As Object
public: System::Object ^ Invoke(cli::array <System::Object ^> ^ parameters);

param.name: parameters
param.span: 符合這個建構函式參數的數目、順序和型別 (在預設繫結器的條件約束下) 的值陣列。

span.span: An array of values that matches the number, order and type (under the constraints of the default binder) of the parameters for this constructor.

param.span: 如果這個建構函式不接受任何參數，則使用含零項目或 的陣列，例如 Object[] parameters = new Object[0]。

span.span: If this constructor takes no parameters, then use either an array with zero elements or , as in Object[] parameters = new Object[0].

param.span: 此陣列中任何未明確使用值初始化的物件，都會包含該物件類型的預設值。

span.span: Any object in this array that is not explicitly initialized with a value will contain the default value for that object type.

param.span: 對於參考型別項目，這個值為 。

span.span: For reference-type elements, this value is .

param.span: 對於實值型別項目，這個值為 0、0.0 或 ，由特定的項目類型決定。

span.span: For value-type elements, this value is 0, 0.0, or , depending on the specific element type.

summary.span: 叫用包含指定參數的執行個體所反映的建構函式，為不常用的參數提供預設值。

span.span: Invokes the constructor reflected by the instance that has the specified parameters, providing default values for the parameters not commonly used.

returns.span: 與建構函式相關聯的類別之執行個體。

span.span: An instance of the class associated with the constructor.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 數字、 類型和順序中的項目`parameters`陣列應該數目、 類型與這個執行個體所反映的建構函式參數的順序相同。The number, type, and order of elements in the `parameters` array should be identical to the number, type, and order of parameters for the constructor reflected by this instance. 然後再呼叫建構函式，`Invoke`可確保呼叫端具有存取權限，並確認參數是否有效。Before calling the constructor, `Invoke` ensures that the caller has access permission and verifies that the parameters are valid. 完全信任程式碼會忽略存取限制。Access restrictions are ignored for fully trusted code. 也就是說，私用建構函式、 方法、 欄位和屬性可以存取，而且只要完全信任程式碼使用反映來叫用。That is, private constructors, methods, fields, and properties can be accessed and invoked using reflection whenever the code is fully trusted. > [!NOTE] > 若要建立沒有執行個體建構函式的實值類型的執行個體，請使用方法。To create an instance of a value type that has no instance constructors, use the method. 這是便利的方法，如下列多載版本，使用預設值。This method is a convenience method for the following overloaded version, using default values. 無法覆寫這個方法。This method cannot be overridden. > [!NOTE] > 從開始[!INCLUDE[net_v20sp1_long](~/includes/net-v20sp1-long-md.md)]，這個方法可以用來存取非公用成員，如果呼叫端被授與與旗標，如果非公用成員的授權集僅限於呼叫者的授與集或子集合類別。Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v20sp1_long](~/includes/net-v20sp1-long-md.md)], this method can be used to access non-public members if the caller has been granted with the flag and if the grant set of the non-public members is restricted to the caller’s grant set, or a subset thereof. (請參閱[反映的安全性考量](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/security-considerations-for-reflection.md)。)(See [Security Considerations for Reflection](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/security-considerations-for-reflection.md).) > > 若要使用這項功能，您的應用程式應將目標設為 [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)] (含) 以後版本。To use this functionality, your application should target the [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)] or later.

para.span: 在[適用於 Windows 市集應用程式的 .NET](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=247912) 或是[可攜式類別庫](~/docs/standard/cross-platform/cross-platform-development-with-the-portable-class-library.md)中，改為攔截基底類別例外狀況 。

summary.span: 在衍生類別中實作時，請叫用在指定 條件約束 (Constraint) 下有指定引數的這個 所反映的建構函式。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 數字、 類型和順序中的項目`parameters`陣列應該數目、 類型與這個執行個體所反映的建構函式參數的順序相同。The number, type, and order of elements in the `parameters` array should be identical to the number, type, and order of parameters for the constructor reflected by this instance. 然後再呼叫建構函式，`Invoke`可確保呼叫端沒有存取權限，以及參數是否正確數目、 順序和類型。Before calling the constructor, `Invoke` ensures that the caller has access permission and that the parameters are of the correct number, order and type. 完全信任程式碼會忽略存取限制。Access restrictions are ignored for fully trusted code. 也就是說，私用建構函式、 方法、 欄位和屬性可以存取，而且只要完全信任程式碼使用反映來叫用。That is, private constructors, methods, fields, and properties can be accessed and invoked using reflection whenever the code is fully trusted. > [!NOTE] > 若要建立沒有執行個體建構函式的實值類型的執行個體，請使用方法。To create an instance of a value type that has no instance constructors, use the method. > [!NOTE] > 從開始[!INCLUDE[net_v20sp1_long](~/includes/net-v20sp1-long-md.md)]，這個方法可以用來存取非公用成員，如果呼叫端被授與與旗標，如果非公用成員的授權集僅限於呼叫者的授與集或子集合類別。Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v20sp1_long](~/includes/net-v20sp1-long-md.md)], this method can be used to access non-public members if the caller has been granted with the flag and if the grant set of the non-public members is restricted to the caller’s grant set, or a subset thereof. (請參閱[反映的安全性考量](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/security-considerations-for-reflection.md)。)(See [Security Considerations for Reflection](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/security-considerations-for-reflection.md).) > > 若要使用這項功能，您的應用程式應將目標設為 [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)] (含) 以後版本。To use this functionality, your application should target the [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)] or later.

summary.span: 取得 值，表示這個成員為建構函式。

span.span: Gets a value indicating that this member is a constructor.

value.span: 值，表示這個成員為建構函式。

span.span: A value indicating that this member is a constructor.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性會覆寫。This property overrides . 因此，當您檢查一組物件 — 例如，將所傳回的陣列—屬性會傳回只有指定的成員時建構函式。Therefore, when you examine a set of objects — for example, the array returned by — the property returns only when a given member is a constructor. ## Examples 下列範例會使用屬性來識別物件做為建構函式。The following example uses the property to identify a object as a constructor. [!code-cpp[Classic MemberInfo.MemberType Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic MemberInfo.MemberType Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic MemberInfo.MemberType Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic MemberInfo.MemberType Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic MemberInfo.MemberType Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic MemberInfo.MemberType Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

.method hidebysig newslot virtual instance void System.Runtime.InteropServices._ConstructorInfo.GetIDsOfNames([in]valuetype System.Guid& riid, native int rgszNames, unsigned int32 cNames, unsigned int32 lcid, native int rgDispId) cil managed
Sub GetIDsOfNames (ByRef riid As Guid, rgszNames As IntPtr, cNames As UInteger, lcid As UInteger, rgDispId As IntPtr) Implements _ConstructorInfo.GetIDsOfNames

virtual void System.Runtime.InteropServices._ConstructorInfo.GetIDsOfNames(Guid % riid, IntPtr rgszNames, System::UInt32 cNames, System::UInt32 lcid, IntPtr rgDispId) = System::Runtime::InteropServices::_ConstructorInfo::GetIDsOfNames;

param.name: riid
param.span: 保留供未來使用。

span.span: Reserved for future use.

param.span: 必須是 IID_NULL。

span.span: Must be IID_NULL.

param.name: rgszNames
param.span: 要對應之傳入的名稱陣列。

span.span: Passed-in array of names to be mapped.

param.name: cNames

param.name: lcid
param.span: 用於解譯名稱的地區設定內容。

summary.span: 將一組名稱對應至一組對應的分派識別項 (Dispatch Identifier)。

span.span: Maps a set of names to a corresponding set of dispatch identifiers.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會從 unmanaged 程式碼，是對存取 managed 類別，並不應該從 managed 程式碼呼叫。This method is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code, and should not be called from managed code. 如需有關`IDispatch::GetIDsOfNames`，請參閱 MSDN Library。For more information about `IDispatch::GetIDsOfNames`, see the MSDN Library.

exception.span: 不支援使用 COM IDispatch 介面進行晚期繫結的存取。

span.span: Late-bound access using the COM IDispatch interface is not supported.

summary.span: 擷取物件的類型資訊，可以用來取得介面的類型資訊。

span.span: Retrieves the type information for an object, which can then be used to get the type information for an interface.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會從 unmanaged 程式碼，是對存取 managed 類別，並不應該從 managed 程式碼呼叫。This method is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code, and should not be called from managed code. 如需有關`IDispatch::GetTypeInfo`，請參閱 MSDN Library。For more information about `IDispatch::GetTypeInfo`, see the MSDN Library.

exception.span: 不支援使用 COM IDispatch 介面進行晚期繫結的存取。

span.span: Late-bound access using the COM IDispatch interface is not supported.

MemberSignature.Value: void _ConstructorInfo.GetTypeInfoCount (out uint pcTInfo);

virtual void System.Runtime.InteropServices._ConstructorInfo.GetTypeInfoCount([Runtime::InteropServices::Out] System::UInt32 % pcTInfo) = System::Runtime::InteropServices::_ConstructorInfo::GetTypeInfoCount;

param.name: pcTInfo
param.span: 指向接收物件提供的類型資訊介面數目的位置。

span.span: Points to a location that receives the number of type information interfaces provided by the object.

summary.span: 擷取物件提供的類型資訊介面數目 (0 或 1)。

span.span: Retrieves the number of type information interfaces that an object provides (either 0 or 1).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會從 unmanaged 程式碼，是對存取 managed 類別，並不應該從 managed 程式碼呼叫。This method is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code, and should not be called from managed code. 如需有關`IDispatch::GetTypeInfoCount`，請參閱 MSDN Library。For more information about `IDispatch::GetTypeInfoCount`, see the MSDN Library.

Sub Invoke (dispIdMember As UInteger, ByRef riid As Guid, lcid As UInteger, wFlags As Short, pDispParams As IntPtr, pVarResult As IntPtr, pExcepInfo As IntPtr, puArgErr As IntPtr) Implements _ConstructorInfo.Invoke

virtual void System.Runtime.InteropServices._ConstructorInfo.Invoke(System::UInt32 dispIdMember, Guid % riid, System::UInt32 lcid, short wFlags, IntPtr pDispParams, IntPtr pVarResult, IntPtr pExcepInfo, IntPtr puArgErr) = System::Runtime::InteropServices::_ConstructorInfo::Invoke;

param.name: dispIdMember
param.span: 辨識成員。

span.span: Identifies the member.

param.name: riid
param.span: 保留供未來使用。

span.span: Reserved for future use.

param.span: 必須是 IID_NULL。

span.span: Must be IID_NULL.

param.name: lcid
param.span: 地區設定內容，用於解譯引數。

span.span: The locale context in which to interpret arguments.

param.name: wFlags
param.span: 描述呼叫之內容的旗標。

span.span: Flags describing the context of the call.

param.name: pDispParams
param.span: 結構的指標，此結構包含引數陣列、指名引數之 DISPID 引數的陣列，以及陣列中項目數目的計數。

span.span: Pointer to a structure containing an array of arguments, an array of argument DISPIDs for named arguments, and counts for the number of elements in the arrays.

param.name: pVarResult
param.span: 指向用於儲存結果之位置的指標。

span.span: Pointer to the location where the result is to be stored.

param.name: pExcepInfo
param.span: 包含例外狀況資訊的結構指標。

span.span: Pointer to a structure that contains exception information.

param.name: puArgErr
param.span: 第一個有錯誤的引數索引。

span.span: The index of the first argument that has an error.

summary.span: 提供物件所公開的屬性和方法的存取權。

span.span: Provides access to properties and methods exposed by an object.

.field public static initonly string TypeConstructorName
Public Shared ReadOnly TypeConstructorName As String

summary.span: 表示型別建構函式方法儲存在中繼資料時的名稱。

span.span: Represents the name of the type constructor method as it is stored in metadata.

summary.span: 這個名稱永遠是「.cctor」。

span.span: This name is always ".cctor".

summary.span: 這個屬性是唯讀的。

span.span: This property is read-only.
